content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the šiauliai district court the court ordered the defendant to pay various fees and awarded certain personal properties to both parties the court also ordered the applicant to pay the defendant a compensation amount the legal text discusses the division of assets determination of asset value and methods used for dividing the property the court received a claim for the dissolution of marriage and established arrangements for the minor daughter the court also addressed joint debts and retention of married names overall the court allowed a divorce and determined the division of property between the parties

metadata.cost: 765.00 EUR  (legal fees + stamp duty) + 67.28 EUR (court fees)
